column4: hi.. where do i get a binary package for generic kernel (2.6.30) for jaunty?
sebastian_: can you give me a link for there?
try 'kernelcheck'... Google for it.  When installed it will make the brand new 2.6.30 to you, _almost_ alone.  If you don't wanna configurate it, so, it'll make it the job alone.
